title.narrative: 2.4 PUBLIC INVESTMENT IN EDUCATION

description.narrative: The Ministry of Education, the Salvadoran Network for the Right to Education and civil society have increased capacity and evidence for advocating for increased investment in public education, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Education â€“ General, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Government institutions and civil society organizations (CSOs) that provide early childhood education implement inter-sectoral protocols for coordinated scaling up of successful models of early education
